title: ATypI Vancouver programme and restaurant guide
content:
**Programme finalised**   
   
Barring last minute cancellations, the speaker programme for the ATypI Vancouver conference has been finalised. Presentation information can be viewed either [by theme](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018010510/http:/www.atypi.org/40_conferences/28_Vancouver/40_timetables) or in a tabular, [track version](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018010510/http:/www.atypi.org/40_conferences/28_Vancouver/40_timetables/ProgrammeWeb.html) in which the sessions are displayed by time and location, making it easy to see the hard decisions that have to be made about whose presentation to attend.   
   
**Restaurant guide online**   
   
Attendees of the Vancouver ATypI conference will receive a carefully compiled booklet listing restaurants in areas near to the conference venues and hotel. For those who want to start planning their eating and entertaining ahead of time, a special [web formatted PDF version](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018010510/http:/www.atypi.org/40_conferences/28_Vancouver/10_venue/RestaurantsWeb.pdf) of this restaurant guide is now available from the ATypI website. Note that this PDF is non-printable.
author: John Hudson
